   16:%%     $Id$
   17:%%
   18:%%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   19:%%% Purpose:Stdlib application test suite.
   20:%%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   21:-module(stdlib_SUITE).
   22:-include("test_server.hrl").
   23:
   24:
   25:% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   26:-define(default_timeout, ?t:minutes(1)).
   27:-define(application, stdlib).
   28:
   29:% Test server specific exports
   30:-export([all/1]).
   31:-export([init_per_testcase/2, fin_per_testcase/2]).
   32:
   33:% Test cases must be exported.
   34:-export([app_test/1]).
   35:-define(cases, [app_test]).
   36:
   37:%%
   38:%% all/1
   39:%%
   40:all(doc) ->
   41:    [];
   42:all(suite) ->
   43:    [?cases].
   44:
   45:init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   46:    ?line Dog=test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   47:    [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   48:fin_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   49:    Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   50:    test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   51:    ok.
   52:
   53:%
   54:% Test cases starts here.
   55:%
   56:app_test(suite) ->
   57:    [];
   58:app_test(doc) ->
   59:    ["Application consistency test."];
   60:app_test(Config) when list(Config) ->
   61:    ?t:app_test(stdlib),
   62:    ok.
   63:
The transformation of this file (64 lines) took 0.01 seconds
